word: We rode out a few miles and took dinner near the beach in a little clump of brush. There was a nice stream flowing close by where we ate our dinner. Then we gathered greens and after going down on the beach we returned to our home.--Ms 86, 1893, p. 2. (Diary, October 8 to November 11, 1893, "Labors at Gisborne, New Zealand.")
